00050 nfs_parameter_t    nfs_param ;
00051         
00052 int idmap_computer_hash_value( char      * name,
00053                                uint32_t  * phashval )
00054 {
00055   char         padded_name[PWENT_MAX_LEN] ;
00056   uint32_t     computed_value = 0 ;
00057   unsigned int i              = 0  ;
00058   unsigned int offset         = 0 ;
00059   uint64_t     extract        = 0 ;
00060   uint64_t     sum            = 0 ;
00061   uint64_t     i1 ;
00062   uint64_t     i2 ;
00063   uint64_t     i3 ;
00064   uint64_t     i4 ;
00065   uint64_t     i5 ;
00066   uint64_t     i6 ;
00067   uint64_t     i7 ;
00068   uint64_t     i8 ;
00069   uint64_t     l  ;
00070 
00071   if( name == NULL || phashval == NULL )
00072     return CLIENT_ID_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00073 
00074   memset( padded_name, 0, PWENT_MAX_LEN ) ;
00075 
00076   /* Copy the string to the padded one */
00077   for( i = 0 ; i < strnlen( name, PWENT_MAX_LEN ) ; padded_name[i] = name[i], i++ ) ;
00078   
00079 
00080 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_PWHASH_COMPUTE
00081   printf( "%s \n", padded_name ) ;
00082 #endif
00083 
00084   /* For each 9 character pack:
00085    *   - keep the 7 first bit (the 8th is often 0: ascii string)
00086    *   - pack 7x9 bit to 63 bits using xor
00087    *   - xor the last 8th bit to a single 0 , or-ed with the rest
00088    * Proceeding with the next 9 bytes pack will produce a new value that is xored with the
00089    * one of the previous iteration */
00090 
00091   for( offset = 0 ; offset < PWENT_MAX_LEN ; offset += 8 )
00092     {
00093       /* input name is ascii string, remove 8th bit on each byte, not significant */
00094       i1 = padded_name[offset+0]  ;
00095       i2 = ( padded_name[offset+1] ) << 8 ;
00096       i3 = ( padded_name[offset+2] ) << 16 ;
00097       i4 = ( padded_name[offset+3] ) << 24 ;
00098       i5 = ( padded_name[offset+4] ) << 32 ;
00099       i6 = ( padded_name[offset+5] ) << 40 ;
00100       i7 = ( padded_name[offset+6] ) << 48 ;
00101       i8 = ( padded_name[offset+7] ) << 56 ;
00102 
00103   sum = (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+0] +
00104         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+1] +
00105         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+2] +
00106         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+3] +
00107         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+4] +
00108         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+5] +
00109         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+6] +
00110         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+7] ;
00111 
00112 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_PWHASH_COMPUTE
00113       printf( "|%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx | = ",
00114              i1, i2, i3, i4, i5, i6, i7, i8 ) ;
00115 #endif
00116 
00117       /* Get xor combibation of all the 8h bit */
00118       l = ( padded_name[offset+0]  ) ^
00119           ( padded_name[offset+1]  ) ^
00120           ( padded_name[offset+2]  ) ^
00121           ( padded_name[offset+3]  ) ^
00122           ( padded_name[offset+4]  ) ^
00123           ( padded_name[offset+5]  ) ^
00124           ( padded_name[offset+6]  ) ^
00125           ( padded_name[offset+7]  ) ;
00126 
00127       extract = i1 ^ i2 ^ i3 ^ i4 ^ i5 ^ i6 ^ i7 ^ i8  | l ;
00128 
00129 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_PWHASH_COMPUTE
00130       printf( "%llx ", extract ) ;
00131 #endif
00132 
00133       computed_value ^= extract ;
00134       computed_value ^= sum ;
00135 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_PWHASH_COMPUTE
00136       printf( ",%x\n  ", computed_value ) ;
00137 #endif
00138     }
00139 
00140   if( computed_value > 0x00000000FFFFFFFFLL )
00141     computed_value = (computed_value >> 32 ) ^ (computed_value & 0x00000000FFFFFFFFLL ) ;
00142 
00143 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_PWHASH_COMPUTE
00144       printf( "===>%x\n", computed_value ) ;
00145 #endif
00146 
00147   *phashval = computed_value ;
00148 
00149 
00150   return CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS ;
00151 } /* idmap_computer_hash_value */
00152 
00153                                          
00154 main( int argc, char * argv[] ) 
00155 {
00156     char name[30] ;
00157     uint32_t valeur ; 
00158     int i ; 
00159 
00160     if( argc == 1 )  
00161         exit( 0 ) ;
00162 
00163     for( i = 1; i < argc ; i++ )
00164       {
00165         strncpy( name, argv[i],30 ) ;   
00166   
00167         idmap_computer_hash_value( name, &valeur ) ;
00168         printf( "%s %x\n", name, valeur ) ;
00169       }
00170 }
